document.full_text: proposed changes to european rules on product returns could cost online retailers 10 billion euros ($14 billion) a year, denting growth and leading to higher prices for consumers, an industry body warned on thursday.
document.title: online retailers blast planned changes to eu rules
lines_and_colors: proposed changes to european rules on product returns could cost online retailers 10 billion euros ($14 billion) a year, denting growth and leading to higher prices for consumers, an industry body warned on thursday.
